## Interactive plot of weight versus age of chicks on different diets

```{r,echo = FALSE,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
library(plotly)
ChickWeight$Diet2 <- paste("Diet ",as.character(ChickWeight$Diet))
f <- list(
  family = "Times New Roman, monospace",
  size = 25,
  color = "#7f7f7f"
)
x <- list(
  title = "Time, days",
  titlefont = f
)
y <- list(
  title = "Weight, gm",
  titlefont = f
)
plot_ly(x = ChickWeight$Time,y = ChickWeight$weight, mode = "markers", color = ChickWeight$Diet2)%>%
  layout(xaxis = x, yaxis = y)
```
